content.question: Which of the following findings provides the strongest evidence for the role of heredity in intellectual performance?

choices.label: Identical twins reared together have more similar intelligence test scores than do identical twins reared apart.
Identical twins reared apart have more similar intelligence test scores than do fraternal twins reared together.
Nontwin siblings reared together have more similar intelligence scores than do nontwin siblings reared apart.
Fraternal twins reared together have more similar intelligence test scores than do fraternal twins reared apart.

content.answer: Identical twins reared apart have more similar intelligence test scores than do fraternal twins reared together.
